Verify the 'Add to Cart' button is visible, enabled, has background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, font size 16px, font weight 600, border radius 4px, padding 10px 15px, and transition property 'background-color 0.3s ease-in-out'
Verify the 'Add to Cart' button hover background color changes to #0056b3 and text color remains #ffffff
Access 'https://example.com/about'

Verify the navigation link with text 'About Us' is active, has bottom border 2px solid #007bff, font family 'Arial', text size 18px, left margin 20px, x position 150px, and y position 20px relative to the viewport top-left

Verify the first product image has source 'product_main.jpg', alt text 'Stylish Red Sneakers', rendered dimensions 200x150px, natural dimensions 800x600px, opacity 100%, loaded within 500ms without a visible watermark, top position 100px, and left position 50px
Navigate to 'https://example.com/search'

Verify the search input field has placeholder text 'Search products...', width 300px, height 40px, border 1px solid #ced4da, font size 14px, initial x position 20px, and y position 20px relative to the form container
Verify the search input field becomes focused with border color #80bdff and its background color remains #ffffff
Open the video player at 'https://example.com/video/lecture.mp4'
Verify video player controls are visible initially and the current video timestamp displays value '00:00'
Verify the 'Mute' button toggles the video's muted state
Verify the 'Fullscreen' button changes the player to fullscreen mode with dimensions matching the browser viewport (e.g., 1920x1080px)

Verify the error message element is visible, displays exact text 'Please fill in all required fields.', has font size 14px, color #dc3545, background color #f8d7da, padding 10px, border radius 4px, is center aligned within its parent container, and has top margin 10px
Verify there are exactly 5 pagination links
Verify the 'Next' link is enabled, has text color #007bff, font weight 500, and border 1px solid #dee2e6
Verify the currently selected page link has background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, font weight 700, and aria-label contains 'Current page'

Verify the avatar image has source 'avatar_user123.jpg', rendered dimensions 60x60px, border radius 50%, border 2px solid #cccccc, is fully loaded, centered horizontally, has top margin 20px, and alt text 'User profile picture'
Open the date picker component
Verify the date input field has placeholder 'Select a date', value set to the current date (e.g., '2023-10-27'), is enabled, has width 150px, height 38px, and font family 'Segoe UI'
Verify the selected date cell has background color #007bff and text color #ffffff

Verify the notification badge element becomes visible, displays count '1', has background color #dc3545, text color #ffffff, font size 10px, border radius 50%, top position 5px, right position 5px relative to the parent icon element, and opacity 100%
Open 'https://example.com/long-article'
Scroll down the page by 500px
Verify the scroll position changes accordingly and the scroll animation is smooth with a duration of approximately 800ms
Verify the fixed header element remains visible at the top (y position 0px) with background color #ffffff and border bottom 1px solid #e0e0e0
Click on the 'Settings' dropdown
Verify the 'Profile' menu item is visible, has text 'Profile', font size 14px, padding 8px 12px, and text align 'left'
Verify the 'Profile' menu item, when focused, has background color #f8f9fa, text color remains #212529, and a transition for background color lasting 200ms

Verify the footer copyright text displays 'Â© 2023 Example Company. All rights reserved.', has font size 12px, color #6c757d, is horizontally centered at the bottom of the viewport, has y position 95% of viewport height, and padding top 20px
Verify the quantity input for 'Product A' has current value '1', width 50px, height 30px, border 1px solid #ced4da, is enabled, has text color #212529, and aria-label 'Product A quantity'
Verify the 'View Details' button for 'Item X' is visible, enabled, has background color #6c757d, text color #ffffff, font size 14px, border radius 3px, and left margin 10px
Verify that clicking the 'View Details' button navigates to 'https://example.com/item/X'

Verify the 'Dashboard' link is active, has background color #e9ecef, text color #007bff, left padding 20px, width 200px, height 40px, opacity 100%, and label 'Dashboard link' when the sidebar is expanded
Verify the theme toggle switch has a pill shape (border radius 999px for its track), width 50px, height 28px, and is initially 'off' (left position of the thumb)
Verify when the theme toggle switch is toggled 'on', its background color changes from #ccc to #28a745, the thumb moves to the right, and the transition duration for this change is 300ms
Verify there are exactly 3 indicator dots, each 8px wide, 8px high, and with border radius 50%
Verify active indicator dot has background color #007bff and inactive dots have background color #cccccc
Verify indicator dots are centered horizontally below the carousel with top margin 15px
Hover over the 'Help' icon

Verify the tooltip becomes visible within 200ms, displays text 'Contact support for assistance.', has background color #343a40, text color #ffffff, font size 12px, padding 8px 10px, opacity 90%, and border radius 4px

Verify the loading spinner element becomes visible, has animation property 'spin 1s linear infinite', width 32px, height 32px, border 4px solid #f3f3f3 with top border color #3498db, and x/y positions centered on the screen (e.g., x: 50%, y: 50%) relative to the viewport
